snippet.title: Port Valley [the 2020 DEMO] - Trailer
snippet.description:
New year (not really…?), new demo (definitely!)

Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/904450
Game Jolt: https://gamejolt.com/games/portvalley/400662
Itch.io: https://wrongpixel.itch.io/port-valley

Joining the Steam Summer Festival, I decided to take some of the new content from the game and make a gameplay DEMO showing some new levels, puzzles, the new User Interface (completely reworked from scratch!), animations… and overall look of the game at the current state of development!

Please, tell your friends.
___________
There's also a Twitter account: https://twitter.com/VisitPortValley
But… meh, who uses that stuff nowadays?
___________

Port Valley is a (not so) classic Point & Click Adventure Game with a lot of pixels created and designed by Al Moreno (Copyright symbol, etc).


Music:

- 'Battle Midi' by djsaryon (https://opengameart.org/content/battle-midi) Licensed under Attribution-ShareAlike 3.0 Unported (CC BY-SA 3.0) license.
https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/3.0/ 
  Arrangement by Al Moreno
___________
